title: Milestone Modelling For Series A Fundraising
description: Develop a strong narrative framework that captures the stakes of techno-feudalism (concentration of power, erosion of democracy, worker precarity). Create brand assets, talking points, and media kits that position the conference as the leading forum on the issue.

milestones.title: Messaging
milestones.description: Develop assets, talking points, and media kits that position the conference as the leading forum on the issue.

milestones.title: Rollout
milestones.description: Run digital campaigns targeting academics, journalists, and activists; foster partnerships with progressive organizations; and amplify voices of key speakers through content drops and video teasers. Drive early RSVPs with thought-leadership articles and community engagement.

milestones.title: Building
milestones.description: Manage the conferenceâ€™s ideas outlast the event itself by building a digital archive and ongoing community channel.
